{5}, {T}: Draw a card. This ability costs {X} less to activate, where X is the greatest mana value among noncreature spells you cast this turn.
flavor_text: [i]Skyhaven was built into a scientific paradise thanks to the wells of stardust surrounding it, but any town with outlaws always has room for some old-fashioned justice.[/i]
